title: Appendix (Online Only) Questionnaire given to SARS survey respondents
body: 7. "In the past three days, when touching objects that might possibly carry the SARS virus [e.g., door handles, buttons in the lifts], did you take preventive measures (e.g., pressing lift buttons with tissue paper)?" 8. "In the past three days, after touching objects that might possibly carry the SARS virus [e.g., door handles, buttons in the lifts], did you wash your hands as soon as possible?"
